statements: SELECT * FROM fashion_designers;
SELECT designer_name, designer_location FROM fashion_designers;
SELECT * FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT designer_name, designer_specialty FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_location = 'Paris';
SELECT designer_id, designer_name FROM fashion_designers ORDER BY designer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT designer_name, designer_specialty FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_location = 'New York';
SELECT designer_name, designer_location FROM fashion_designers ORDER BY designer_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT designer_location FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_specialty = 'Haute Couture';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_designers FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_specialty = 'Streetwear';
SELECT * FROM designers;
SELECT designer_name, designer_country FROM designers WHERE designer_country='France';
SELECT designer_name, designer_country FROM designers WHERE designer_year_established > 2010;
SELECT designer_name, designer_country, designer_year_established FROM designers ORDER BY designer_year_established DESC;
SELECT d.designer_name, c.collection_name FROM collections c JOIN designers d ON c.designer_id = d.designer_id;
SELECT * FROM designers WHERE designer_country = 'Italy';
SELECT designer_name, designer_country FROM designers WHERE designer_year_established >= 2000;
SELECT collection_name, collection_year, designer_name FROM collections INNER JOIN designers ON collections.designer_id = designers.designer_id WHERE designer_country = 'France';

SELECT collection_name, designer_name, designer_year_established FROM collections INNER JOIN designers ON collections.designer_id = designers.designer_id WHERE collection_year < 2010 ORDER BY designer_name ASC;

SELECT designer_name, COUNT(collection_id) AS total_collections FROM designers LEFT JOIN collections ON designers.designer_id = collections.designer_id GROUP BY designer_name HAVING total_collections >= 3 ORDER BY total_collections DESC;
SELECT * FROM designers ORDER BY designer_name ASC;
SELECT designer_name, designer_location FROM designers WHERE designer_location = 'New York';
SELECT collaboration_name FROM collaborations WHERE designer_id = 1 AND collection_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM collections WHERE designer_id = 2 ORDER BY collection_name DESC;
SELECT designer_name, collection_name FROM designers INNER JOIN collections ON designers.designer_id = collections.designer_id;
SELECT * FROM designers ORDER BY designer_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT designer_name, designer_location FROM designers WHERE designer_location='New York' AND designer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT d.designer_name, c.collection_name FROM designers d JOIN collections c ON d.designer_id = c.designer_id WHERE c.collection_name='Fall 2022';

SELECT d.designer_name, c.collection_name, co.collaboration_name FROM designers d JOIN collections c ON d.designer_id = c.designer_id JOIN collaborations co ON c.collection_id = co.collection_id WHERE d.designer_location='Paris';

SELECT designer_id, designer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_collaborations FROM designers d JOIN collaborations co ON d.designer_id = co.designer_id GROUP BY designer_id, designer_name ORDER BY total_collaborations DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM designers;
SELECT name, country FROM designers WHERE country='USA';
SELECT name, birthdate FROM designers ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT collections.name, collections.year, designers.name AS designer_name FROM collections JOIN designers ON collections.designer_id = designers.designer_id;

SELECT designers.name AS designer_name, partners.name AS partner_name FROM collaborations JOIN designers ON collaborations.designer_id = designers.designer_id JOIN partners ON collaborations.partner_id = partners.partner_id;
SELECT * FROM designers;
SELECT name, country FROM designers WHERE country='USA';
SELECT collections.name, designers.name FROM collections JOIN designers ON collections.designer_id = designers.designer_id;

SELECT designers.name AS designer_name, partners.name AS partner_name FROM collaborations JOIN designers ON collaborations.designer_id = designers.designer_id JOIN partners ON collaborations.partner_id = partners.partner_id;
SELECT name, YEAR(birthdate) AS birth_year FROM designers WHERE country='France' ORDER BY birth_year DESC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_designers;
SELECT designer_name, designer_country FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_specialization = 'Haute Couture';
SELECT designer_name, designer_specialization FROM fashion_designers ORDER BY designer_name ASC;
SELECT collection_name, collection_year FROM collections WHERE collection_year >= 2020 ORDER BY collection_year DESC;

SELECT d.designer_name, c.collection_name, cp.partner_name FROM fashion_designers d JOIN designer_collections dc ON d.designer_id = dc.designer_id JOIN collections c ON c.collection_id = dc.collection_id JOIN designer_collaborations dcol ON d.designer_id = dcol.designer_id JOIN collaboration_partners cp ON cp.collaboration_id = dcol.collaboration_id ORDER BY d.designer_name, c.collection_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_designers;
SELECT designer_name, designer_country FROM fashion_designers ORDER BY designer_country DESC;
SELECT designer_name, designer_specialization FROM fashion_designers WHERE designer_country = 'France';
SELECT d.designer_name, c.collection_name FROM fashion_designers d JOIN designer_collections dc ON d.designer_id = dc.designer_id JOIN collections c ON dc.collection_id = c.collection_id;

SELECT d.designer_name, cp.partner_name FROM fashion_designers d JOIN designer_collaborations dco ON d.designer_id = dco.designer_id JOIN collaboration_partners cp ON dco.collaboration_id = cp.collaboration_id;
